name: claude-skills
description: A collection of skills for Claude Code. Document manipulation, automation, and more.

skills.name: Slide Studio
skills.description: Create and modify PowerPoint presentations (PPTX) through direct XML manipulation. Use this skill when creating presentations from scratch, adding/editing slides, inserting images, or applying POTX templates. Supports all 11 standard Office slide layouts.

skills.name: Oxen Office
skills.description: Inspect, build, and verify Office documents (PPTX, DOCX, XLSX) using the oxen CLI. Supports ASCII preview, JSON spec-based building, text extraction, and comprehensive document analysis.
